A software upgrade is available. Please select YES to upgrade now - this will take a couple of minutes - or leave in standby (off button on remote) when finished viewing to upgrade later. Thank you.
Your receiver is currently downloading a essential software upgrade. This will only take a few minutes. Please DO NOT adjust your receiver or switch OFF during this time. Thank you.
